content.question: The reactants represented above are placed in a vessel and a reaction occurs. Which of the following best represents the contents of the vessel after the reaction has proceeded as completely as possible?

choices.label: The figure presents 1 C 2 molecule, 4 H 2 molecules, and 6 O 2 molecules in a vessel.
The figure presents 2 C O 2 molecules, and 4 H 2 O molecules in a vessel.
The figure presents 2 C O 2 molecules, 2 O 2 molecules, and 4 H 2 O molecules in a vessel.
The figure presents 4 C O 2 molecules, and 4 H 2 O molecules in a vessel.

content.answer: The figure presents 2 C O 2 molecules, 2 O 2 molecules, and 4 H 2 O molecules in a vessel.

skill.text: 5.C: Explain the relationship between variables within an equation when one variable changes.
